snippet: SAC Capital Advisors tells its employees the fund will survive a wave of investor withdrawals. | JPMorgan Chase faces a big loss in the deal to settle the bankruptcy of Jefferson County, Ala. | John Thain discusses his regrets over the sale of...
abstract: SAC Capital Advisors tells its employees the fund will survive a wave of investor withdrawals. | JPMorgan Chase faces a big loss in the deal to settle the bankruptcy of Jefferson County, Ala. | John Thain discusses his regrets over the sale of Merrill Lynch. | Countries are trying to lure foreign entrepreneurs with the promise of start-up visas.
